summary:
The most badass spell in Skyrim! Effects include:
- Fire Storm
- Blizzard
- Summon dragon
- Shockwave

You will find the spell tome in the pool just outside of Dragonsreach.

Also, why not subscribe to my YouTube channel!

http://youtube.com/SmikeTV
descriptionHtml:
Full guide to find the spell tome:

1 - Go to Whiterun.
2 - Climb the stairs to Dragonsreach.
3 - Right before entering Dragonsreach, turn right and jump into the pool.
4 - You will find the spell tome floating in the pool.

Enjoy!
author: Smike
